hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select t1.uuid as uuid, t1.create_time as create_time, t1.creator as creator, t1.modifier as modifier, t1.modify_time as modify_time, t1.rec_ver as rec_ver, t1.name as name, t1.id as id, t1.code as code, t1.title as title, t1.theme as theme, t1.js_module as js_module, t1.enabled as enabled, t1.remark as remark, t1.system_unit_id as system_unit_id, t2.uuid as app_pi_uuid, t2.parent_uuid as parent_app_pi_uuid, t2.app_product_uuid as app_product_uuid from app_system t1 left join app_product_integration t2 on t1.uuid = t2.app_system_uuid and t2.data_type = 1 where 1 = 1 <if isNotBlank(keyword)> and (t1.name like '%${keyword}%' or t1.id like '%${keyword}%' or t1.code like '%${keyword}%') </if> <if isNotBlank(whereSql)> and ${whereSql} </if> <if isNotBlank(orderBy)> ${orderBy} </if>

select t1.uuid as id, t1.name as name from app_system t1 inner join app_product_integration t2 on t1.uuid = t2.app_system_uuid and t2.data_type = 1 where 1 = 1 <if isNotBlank(appProductUuid)> and t2.app_product_uuid = :appProductUuid </if> <if isNotBlank(systemUnitId)> and t1.system_unit_id = :systemUnitId </if> <if isNotBlank(name) || isNotBlank(code) || isNotBlank(id)> and (1 = 2 <if isNotBlank(name)> or lower(t1.name) like '%${name?lower_case}%' </if> <if isNotBlank(code)> or lower(t1.code) like '%${code?lower_case}%' </if> <if isNotBlank(id)> or lower(t1.id) like '%${id?lower_case}%' </if> ) </if> order by t1.code asc, t1.name

select t1.uuid as id, t1.name as name from app_system t1 left join app_product_integration t2 on t1.uuid = t2.app_system_uuid and t2.data_type = 1 where t1.id in (:appSysIds) order by t1.code asc, t1.name
